title: Scheduling & Cancellations
document_text: All patient appointments must be confirmed at least 48 hours in advance. Cancellation fees may apply if canceled within 24 hours. Same-day appointments require provider approval.

title: Patient Data Privacy
document_text: Patient data must be stored in encrypted databases with access restricted to authorized staff. Unauthorized access is subject to disciplinary action and potential legal ramifications.

title: Follow-up & Referrals
document_text: Providers should schedule follow-up appointments within two weeks of any significant diagnosis or medication change. Referrals must be documented in the EHR system and communicated to patients within three business days.

title: Telehealth Consultations
document_text: Telehealth visits are permitted for non-emergency follow-ups and medication reviews. Providers must use the approved video-conferencing platform. Co-pays may apply based on insurance coverage.

title: Infection Control
document_text: All clinical staff must follow hand-washing protocols and utilize PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) as appropriate. Isolation procedures must be observed for contagious illnesses.
